key.name: disable-connected-notifications
key.description: Set this to true to disable notifications when connecting to a network.

key.name: disable-disconnected-notifications
key.description: Set this to true to disable notifications when disconnecting from a network.

key.name: disable-vpn-notifications
key.description: Set this to true to disable notifications when connecting to or disconnecting from a VPN.

key.name: suppress-wireless-networks-available
key.description: Set this to true to disable notifications when Wi-Fi networks are available.

key.name: stamp
key.description: Used to determine whether settings should be migrated to a new version.

key.name: disable-wifi-create
key.description: Set to true to disable creation of adhoc networks when using the applet.

key.name: show-applet
key.summary: Show the applet in notification area
key.description: Set to FALSE to disable displaying the applet in the notification area.

key.name: ignore-ca-cert
key.description: Set this to true to disable warnings about CA certificates in EAP authentication.

key.name: ignore-phase2-ca-cert
key.description: Set this to true to disable warnings about CA certificates in phase 2 of EAP authentication.
